name: Create GIF with GIPHY from Google Sheet rows and send an email
description: Every time a new Google Sheets row is created, Make will automatically translate a word to a GIF using GIPHY and send it in an email. This example uses the spreadsheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Z8sF4UFOzGWc7unyk3f_xJr--iStT2hVzeotEvPLuBg/edit#gid=0).
